title: Life Philosophy

questions.text: For me, a happy life together would include...
choices: Growing together and chasing shared dreams
Deep connection and feeling truly known by you
Enjoying the everyday moments, big and small
Building a stable, secure foundation together
Other / It depends

questions.text: When I think about our future together, I dream about...
choices: Big adventures and ambitious goals we'll tackle together
A steady, comfortable life with someone I love
Constant learning and growth as individuals and as a couple
Finding the right balance between career, fun, and us
Other / It depends

questions.text: When it comes to balancing work, life, and us, I believe...
choices: We should both go after our careers and support each other fully
Our relationship comes first - work is just how we fund our life
Finding fulfillment in both work and love matters equally
It'll shift over time and we'll figure it out together
Other / It depends

questions.text: Years from now, I hope we'll look back and feel proud of...
choices: The experiences and memories we made together
The way we showed up for each other
The challenges we faced and grew through
The peaceful, loving life we built
Other / It depends

questions.text: What drives me most in life is...
choices: Building a successful, meaningful career
Having deep, loving relationships
Freedom to live life on my own terms
Making a positive impact on the world
Other / It depends

description: Share your perspectives on what matters most in life together.
